title: Info Security Policies
description: Information security vulnerabilities and risks; legal, cost, privacy, and technology constraints; derivation of strategies; technical and procedural means of achieving desired ends. Credit will not be awarded for both MGT 6725 and MGT 4725 or CS 4725 or CS 6725 or PUBP 4725 or PUBP 6725.
